attributes.action: bring forward the date of digital TV switchover for the whole of the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The majority of people in the UK support  and are ready for digital terrestrial switchover.  With DVB boxes available from just £20 the upgrade is within reach of everyone.

Areas with full digital reception should have the analogue signal switched off now.  Areas where digital cannot be commissioned until analogue is removed should also be converted now.  Everywhere else should aim to be transmitting digital at full power by the end of 2008.

The public have embraced digital television much quicker than expected, so lets bring the switchover dates forward.
